name: TheStitch
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This is a flash briefing dedicated to assisting those who are interested in thrifting. Whether you are just beginning or are a seasoned thrifter, we are sure to introduce you to some new tips and tricks to use for thrifting. Join us as we visit the world of thrifting. In this series we will provide tips on getting started, and the different types of shops you can experience. We look forward to assisting you on your thrifting journey, and will be sure to be here every step of the way. If you have any topics you’d like us to cover, or have any questions or concerns; feel free to send them to our inbox.
